name: Speed Spell - Deceased Synchron
text: You can remove 8 of your Speed Counters; Choose 1 Level 8 or lower Synchro monster in your Extra Deck. Banish 1 Tuner monster and 1 non-Tuner monster in your Graveyard whose total Levels equal that Synchro monster's Level, and Special Summon it. Banish it during the End Phase.
